subtitle: A classic brown sauce recipe. Also known as Espagnole sauce.

method.text: Heat the butter in a small pan. Add the chopped bacon. Fry for 5-6 min.
Add onion, mushroom and carrot. Fry for 3-5 min.
Stir in the flour. Cook for 1 min, stirring.
Gradually stir in the stock, stirring after each addition until well mixed. Bring to the boil and cook until thickened slightly.
Stir in the tomato puree, seasoning to taste and sherry. Reduce heat. Leave to simmer for 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
Strain the sauce, reheat, skimming off any fat.

title: Brown sauce
